text: sanwardhana saha pradeshiya 23
kadugannawa hi motar ratha
namuth, me puwatha apata suwisheshi wanne ohu shri lankawe rasikawiyakage upan dinaya samarima sandaha ekwima nisaweni.
aarambhayedi madihathkaruwaku lesa katayuthu kala banku anekuth pa්ragdhanayan thaman thula gilwa ganna pa්rabala mulya eekadhikara bawata pathwe.

thawa yanna thiyanawa.
ewita aya thaniwama padawan aa rathaye ma rohalata ragena yannata saraseddi…

manushya lokaye sitiyadi thama kamathi kale, thaman udesa ho anun udesa harak marimatayi.
me wagema thama apath ekama thana palwemin, ekama dewalma liyamin, kiyawamin innawa nam apeth pawathmata tharjanayak athi wenawa.

eya kelin ma dhuma kethuwak kiyawath ga්rahakayak kiyawath kiwa nohaki ‘suruttuwaka hadayak athi mema amuthu awakasha wasthuwa sakwala kisiyam shishtacharayakin pamini yanayak yayi wishwasa kerenawa....

mema komishan sabhawa wasara ekahamarak thisse akriyawa pawathina heyin adhyapana kshethrayata adala nawa prathipaththi thiranaya kirimata nohaki wi athi bawa "diwayina" wisin kihipawarakma heli karana ladi.
me rate dharma shrawanayata pera dewatharadhanaya ha kalaghosha kirime charithraya handunwa dena ladde ethan sitaya.

eya pala kaleth dahawal 1.00 ta withara ee wunath itha ikmanin eyata patakayan adi aawa witharak neme eeta pasu dinayeth ewanima patakayan pirisak wagema nawa patakayan pirisakuth ekathu wela thibuna.

shri lankawe aaradhanawakin thorawa eya yuda katayuthu sandaha yoda ganima thahanam bawa awasana badu giwisume sandahan wena namuth shri lankawa itha dushkara thathwayakata wati athi bawin naya sahana salasimata hambanthota waraya yudamaya katayuthu sandaha yoda ganimata ida dena lesa china rajaya illa sitimata ida athayi indiyanu niladharinge biyak pawathi.
ma ema pimma panne pasale hatharawani shreniye igenuma labamin siti awadiye di ape niwase thibi hamuwunu gunadasa liyanage liyu “mulu hadin mama ayata pem kota” namathi nawakathawa kiyawimeni.
nawaloka rohala haskam mandirayak wuna.

polis mathda්rawya nashaka watalimakadi miyagiya ‘kudu lalitha’ namaththata ayath rupiyal koti 6.85ka depala rajasanthaka kere.

wana aliyage aayusha awurudu 70 k pamanaya.
samahara welawata api inna
unnanse janathawa mathak une me welaweya.
eheth chandawalata wiyadam kirima sandaha ada me rate deshapalanagnyayan wishala pirisak aprasiddhiye kollakathi.
kolambaa aga nagara aashritha nagarika sanwardhana wyapruthiya mehi idikirim katayuthu sidu kala athara salasum dayakathwaya nagarika sanwardhana adhikariya sapayana ladi.

ese gaththawunge mudalada ahimikota (thahanam kota)wiharayatama
atham thanaka balu balmata nadaththuwak naththa se penena gammiris waga bimya.
ee sandaha kandawura aasannaye walala wapura athi maraugul bimbomba iwath karamin idiriyata ya yuthu wiya.
paw asaranaya, heta udetawath katha karala balanta ooni.

chulladharmapala jathakayath, kuti dushaka jathakayath wenath aramunu itukara ganimata liya athi jathaka katha bawath eewaye adala pudgalayan nirayata yawa aththe charithrayak washayen bawa mage hangimayi.nirayata noyawa thirisan aathma bhawayaka ho wenath minis aathma bhawayaka upatha labimata salaswa, paw pala dun katha puwath da apata asannata labe.
